document.full_text: jim larranaga has taken the miami hurricanes' basketball job after 14 years at george mason, including an improbable run to the final four in 2006.
document.title: coach jim larranaga leaving george mason for miami
lines_and_colors: jim larranaga has taken the miami hurricanes' basketball job after 14 years at george mason, including an improbable run to the final four in 2006.
